docs.snippet: Coach Rex Ryan said every player would have to earn his way, which is particularly true at quarterback — by far the Jets’ most pressing issue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach Rex Ryan said every player would have to earn his way, which is particularly true at quarterback — by far the Jets’ most pressing issue.
docs.abstract: New York Jets return to training camp as revamped team, with players speaking of a new, competitive spirit following major roster and coaching shake up; Coach Rex Ryan remains reluctant to speak about pressing issue of who will become team's starting quarterback.

headline.main: Remade Jets Open Camp and Practice Restraint
headline.print_headline:
Remade Jets Open Camp
And Practice Restraint

docs.snippet: Tom Brady and Vince Wilfork did not mention the full name of their former teammate Aaron Hernandez, but they talked about the sadness of a lost life and the need to move forward....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Brady and Vince Wilfork did not mention the full name of their former teammate Aaron Hernandez, but they talked about the sadness of a lost life and the need to move forward.
docs.abstract: New England Patriots captains Tom Brady and Vince Wilfork, in media address, discuss need for team to move forward without directly addressing disgraced teammate Aaron Hernandez, who has been charged with murder; WIlfork notes that team chemistry is likely to be challenged but says team will move forward with awareness and compassion.

headline.main: Wilfork Says Hernandez Case Will Test Patriots’ Chemistry
headline.print_headline: Patriots Are Quiet, but Wilfork Says Team Chemistry Will Be Challenge

docs.snippet: Quarterback Matt Ryan, 28, is entering the sixth and final season of his original rookie contract....
docs.lead_paragraph: Quarterback Matt Ryan, 28, is entering the sixth and final season of his original rookie contract.
docs.abstract: Quarterback Matt Ryan and the Atlanta Falcons agree to terms on five-year contract extension.

headline.main: Ryan and Falcons Agree to Terms on Five-Year Contract Extension

docs.snippet: The University of Montana's football program was placed on probation for three years Friday and will have its scholarships reduced from 63 to 59 over the same period after the NCAA found boosters provided extra benefits to players, including bail ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The University of Montana's football program was placed on probation for three years Friday and will have its scholarships reduced from 63 to 59 over the same period after the NCAA found boosters provided extra benefits to players, including bail money and free legal representation for two athletes.

headline.main: NCAA Penalizes Montana Football Over Booster Perks
headline.print_headline: NCAA Penalizes Montana Football Over Booster Perks

docs.snippet: Aaron Rodgers and Ryan Braun are two California natives who found sporting success and friendship in Wisconsin. Until now....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aaron Rodgers and Ryan Braun are two California natives who found sporting success and friendship in Wisconsin. Until now.
docs.abstract: Close friendship between Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers and Milwaukee Brewers slugger Ryan Braun has grown tense following Braun's 65-game suspension for doping; Rodgers, who defended Braun repeatedly from drug allegations, finds himself in awkward position of having been hoodwinked.

headline.main: Suspension Is Testing Friendship of Two Stars
headline.print_headline:
Suspension Is Testing
Friendship
Of 2 Stars

docs.snippet: Youth players who took part in a limited number of contact drills in practice were no more likely to absorb head hits during games, a study showed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Youth players who took part in a limited number of contact drills in practice were no more likely to absorb head hits during games, a study showed.
docs.abstract: Study published in Annals of Biomedical Engineering finds that youth football players are not more vulnerable to head hits in games if they take part in fewer contact drills during practice; study comes amid a debate over how much practice is needed to prepare young players to protect themselves during games; finding could bolster calls to reduce frequency of contact drills in youth football leagues.

headline.main: Concussion Study Makes Case for Reducing Contact Drills for Youth Players
headline.print_headline:
Concussion Study Makes Case
For Fewer Youth Contact Drills

docs.snippet: Wallabies fullback Kurtley Beale has been ruled out for the year after being told by new coach Ewen McKenzie to have an operation on his shoulder and come back fit and healthy next year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wallabies fullback Kurtley Beale has been ruled out for the year after being told by new coach Ewen McKenzie to have an operation on his shoulder and come back fit and healthy next year.

headline.main: McKenzie Tells Wallaby Beale to Get His Shoulder Fixed
headline.print_headline: McKenzie Tells Wallaby Beale to Get His Shoulder Fixed

docs.snippet: College football's Davids will get fewer chances to knock off the Goliaths in the coming years....
docs.lead_paragraph: College football's Davids will get fewer chances to knock off the Goliaths in the coming years.

headline.main: David to Get Fewer Cracks at Goliath
headline.print_headline: David to Get Fewer Cracks at Goliath

docs.snippet: Liverpool reiterated their desire to hold on to prized striker Luis Suarez on Friday and said the coveted Uruguayan would feature against Thailand in the final leg of their Asian tour....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool reiterated their desire to hold on to prized striker Luis Suarez on Friday and said the coveted Uruguayan would feature against Thailand in the final leg of their Asian tour.

headline.main: No Plans to Sell Suarez, Say Liverpool
headline.print_headline: No Plans to Sell Suarez, Say Liverpool

docs.snippet: Ryan Braun apparently has some work to do to repair his friendship with Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun apparently has some work to do to repair his friendship with Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers.
